column5: Was just watching the CNN..lots of tornado warnings your (red)neck of the woods. Head for the basement or maybe grab a parachute and go for a ride..

My understanding was that there are not a lot of basements in the south. Insert easy trailer park joke here_________.  Seriously though, I don't think there are a lot of basements. Scary stuff. Hold on tight dawg.
I wonder if he has the boat and all fishing gear stored in his tornado shelter

yeah, they've been going off all night!... I don't pay them much mind, I'd rather keep an eye to the southwest window!  The 3 legged Border Collie is asleep at my feet and will let me know when it's time to head down to the basement!
... yeah, that's a pretty fancy one for around these parts!!!  I usually just enlarge an Armadillo burrow for my "basement"... shelter AND vittles!!!
Nothing wrong with using what you have on hand, and it's not like it was a short bus.  Although I wonder why they felt the need to cover/remove the word school, but not the word bus?
It was their hunting vehicle before the engine blew!!!  Sleep well Glen...
if you need i can take care of your boat for ya
I dunno if you can afford it Henry... it costs 50 cents (American) just to look at a picture of it!!!
